textt7AA: Smart material delivery for challenging construction sites
text8: Effective projects cost less and completed on time.
text81: Carefully monitor the movement of building materials to ...
text82: Ensure the health and well-being of people working on.
text9A: Chaos can be an amazing creative force, building new buildings out of the dust. Chaos causes accidents, delays and losses. He introduces projects into stress and frustration. This means that you are not really in control of the situation.
text10: It's time to clean up your construction site and take control of your project
text10A: We take care of deliveries to the construction site and the people who rely on them
text10B: We know all about pride from a shiny new building. We also know all about the frustration of trying to complete a project on time and on budget.
text11A: StroyControl is an intelligent delivery management system that provides information and control of materials on complex construction sites in real time.
text12: Track delivery throughout the supply chain
text12A: Optimize and control your arrival on site
text12B: Take control of your data in real time
text13: From supplier to subcontractor, you always know where your materials are, making conventional waste a thing of the past and reducing on-site accidents.
text13A: Delivery vehicles arrive at fixed intervals at pre-designated bays where unloading equipment is ready and waiting for them.
text13B: Smart reporting empowers you to make decisions based on how things are at the moment. No more manual pour reports or 10,000 monthly invoice checks, it's all available online with no effort.
text14A: We take care of all your various deliveries and their many specialized unloading requirements.
text16: Concrete deliveries are accurately planned and condition controlled to ensure the maximum possible time for installation.
text17A: Thanks to reliable construction, everyone wins - municipalities fulfill their obligations to citizens, investors receive certificates for their projects, and general contractors receive an increased reputation.
text19: By optimizing logistics, fewer trips are required, resulting in lower CO2 emissions. CO2 emissions are controlled, allowing you to set goals and make measurable improvements.
text19A: Waste sorting is simplified, waste disposal is automated, and damaged materials are reused when needed, reducing costs and encouraging recycling and reuse.
text19B: Traffic problems and noise pollution are reduced, which improves the life of the local community. Improved material handling and storage means workers are also better protected.
text19C: Reliable design StroyKontrol is included in the standard package.
text21B: Works on any device - mobile phone, tablet, laptop
text22: Whether it's sunny or dark, there's a screen mode to suit
text22A: People from all over the world work at a modern construction site. Language is not a problem for StroyKontrol.
text22B: People in different positions use different devices. StroyControl is automatically configured in accordance with the requirements. You can also project live project dashboards onto wallboards.
text23A: Getting started with StroyControl is easy, just order a demo version.
text24A: There is always room for improvement in construction logistics.
text24B: We see great potential in solutions like StroyKontrol and want to use them to improve our construction processes.
